text: The 2019 Luganville Premier League is the 2019 season of the Luganville Premier League, the top-tier football league in Luganville organized by the Luganville Football Association. It started on 3 April 2019https://twitter.com/VanuatuB/status/1168941897211088896 and finished on 28 September.https://twitter.com/VanuatuB/status/1176850139157278720https://twitter.com/VanuatuB/status/1177953167432196097 Malampa Revivors was the champion while Vaum United was the runner- uphttps://www.facebook.com/OceaniaFootballCenter/photos/a.277471949595263/395044004504723/?type=3&theater; ==Teams== A total of eight teams compete in the league. *Malampa Revivors *Vaum United *Santos (Luganville) *Sia-Raga (Luganville) *Amicale (Luganville) *Tafea (Luganville) *Seveners United (Luganville) *Torba United (Luganville) ==League table== == Results == ==References== ==External links== Vanuatu, Luganville Luganville Luganville
title: 2019 Luganville Premier League
